Module com.example
Package com.example

Class DrawingCanvas

java.lang.Object
com.example.DrawingCanvas
public class DrawingCanvas extends Object
Represents a drawing canvas where lines can be drawn.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DrawingCanvas(javafx.scene.Scene scene, Point oldPosition)
    Constructs a new drawing canvas with the specified scene and old position.
